title: COVID-19 — Neighborhood Naturopathic - West Seattle
cleaned_text: COVID-19 Safety Appointment Guidelines: Regardless of vaccination status, if you or anyone in your household has symptoms including coughing, sneezing, congestion, runny nose, fever, we ask that you EITHER receive a negative COVID-19 test prior to coming into the clinic, or change your appointment to telemedicine for the health and safety of our patients and staff. This includes patients who have been vaccinated against COVID-19. Telemedicine appointments are available and preferred for sick visits. Masks are strongly encouraged but not required except for sick visits. A mask must be worn at all time if you are being seen for an acute or sick visit. If you have COVID-19 symptoms: Neighborhood Naturopathic is not a COVID-19 testing site. Please visit [here](https://www.kingcounty.gov/depts/health/covid-19/testing.aspx)for free COVID testing in King County. COVID-19 Vaccination: Neighborhood Naturopathic is currently only offering COVID-19 vaccinations for children. For adults, please visit [this site](https://vaccinelocator.doh.wa.gov)to find COVID-19 vaccination locations in Washington State. Unsure whether you or your children qualify for the vaccine or boosters? We encourage you to visit the [CDC COVID 19 website](https://www.cdc.gov/coronavirus/2019-ncov/vaccines/index.html)for the most up-to-date and accurate recommendations. Please know that all of our guidelines are in place to keep our patients and providers as safe as possible. We take our commitment to your health seriously. Thank you so much for helping us in this effort.
